thread.title: Canopy Partners Named to 2015 Inc. 5000 Fastest Growing Companies List
thread.title_full: Canopy Partners Named to 2015 Inc. 5000 Fastest Growing Companies List

author: Mallory Moses
title: Canopy Partners Named to 2015 Inc. 5000 Fastest Growing Companies List
text:
Canopy Partners, a North Carolina based provider of healthcare IT and business services, has been named to the Inc. 5000 List, an independent ranking of the fastest- growing private companies in America. Inc. Magazine has been publishing this list for 34 years, and this achievement puts Canopy in rarefied company. Over the years, this elite group has included companies such as Microsoft, Timberland, Vizio, Intuit, Chobani, Oracle, and Zappos. The criteria for making the Inc. 5000 list are quite rigorous. Companies must:
 have generated revenue by March 31, 2011; have generated at least $100,000 in revenue in 2011; have generated at least $2 million in revenue in 2014; be privately held, for profit; based in the U.S., and independent (not a subsidiary or division of another company)
In its first year of eligibility, Canopy Partners ranked # 3633. Over the past three years, the company has grown by 86% and created 41 new jobs. Worth Saunders, Canopy Partners CEO, says “We are honored to receive this award. Canopy Partners has developed a winning culture focused on integrity, innovation and high touch service. With this great team, I am fully confident that we can continue to climb the charts in future years.”
###
About Canopy Partners
Canopy Partners is a privately held healthcare technology company that specializes in medical billing, business analytics, information technology, and management consulting services. Our passion is elevating the role of medical imaging in the healthcare value chain. We create flexible, customer-driven business solutions that improve our client’s productivity, profitability, and patient care.
In addition to the Inc. 5000 award, Canopy has been named to the “Triad Fast 50 List” of fastest growing companies in Central NC for the past two years, and the regional “Top Places to Work” list for three consecutive years, winning first place twice.
To learn more, please visit http://www.canopy-partners.com or contact Mallory Moses at 336-235-2257.
